body_content.explanation: a person or thing that makes someone more calm and less worried:
examples: Sarah was a toucher, a listener, a soother.
The power of the will can prove an effective soother of the nerves.

body_content.explanation: something that makes a part of the body less painful:
examples: Ginger ale is an effective stomach soother.
Try camomile as a soother for eczema.

body_content.explanation: a smooth rubber or plastic object that is given to a baby to suck in order to comfort it and make it stop crying:
examples: If the baby continues to cry, give it a soother.
My baby refused to take a soother.
